Package com.cmput301w23t09.qrhunter.scanqr

Class LocationPhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w23t09.qrhunter.scanqr.LocationPhotoController
  • public class LocationPhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
    The LocationPhotoController manages the backend logic for letting a user take a location photo
    See Also:
    LocationPhotoFragment, CameraLocationPhotoController

        imageCapture - The ImageCapture use case that lets us take photos
